ingredients.name: cake flour (or 1/2 cup AP flour + 1/2 tsp cornstarch)

steps.description: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and line muffin tins with paper liners.
Combine half the sugar with the flour and salt.
In a large bowl, combine the egg whites, water, vanilla, cream of tartar, and remaining sugar. Whip together with a whisk until medium peaks form.
Sift a small amount of the dry ingredients into the egg whites, then fold in with a spatula. Do this in at least 6 batches to ensure even folding.
Fill muffin cups all the way to the top with batter and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the tops are golden and a toothpick comes out clean.
Fill with jam, if desired. Top with sweetened whipped cream (add a small amount of vanilla for an awesome taste), then garnish with berries.
